name: Binary Bugs
description:
The game is basically allowing good bugs to reach the end, red bugs will cost you a point and take you closer to game over. Gates Open through binary translation of your decimal input from 0 to 15. For example, if you input 7 its 4 bit is 0111 so, 2nd, 3rd and 4th gates open. This is my first game jam, hope it is fun! 

Music Credits -: JAN125 (opengameart.org)
